EmailTemplate.subject: Would you like to hear more from us?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for your interest in our Intertial Navigation System infographic!!
Click here if you'd like to view again <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/Advantages-Disadvantages-Inertial-Navigation-System_infographic.pdf]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}},
We saw that you recently downloaded the Advantages vs. Disadvantages on an Inertial Navigation System infographic and thought you might like to receive newsletters or product information and special offers from our HGuide team.
To opt-in, please enter your information here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/HGuide-sign-up.html]]>.
Best,
The HGuide Support Team Opt-In <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/HGuide-sign-up.html]]>
